name: miracle-eye
flavor_text: Enables a Dark-type target to be hit by Psychic-type attacks. This also enables an evasive target to be hit.
effect_text_extend: Resets the target's evasion to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the field.  A dark Pok√©mon under this effect takes normal damage from psychic moves.  This move itself ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
effect_text_simple: Forces the target to have no evasion, and allows it to be hit by Psychic moves even if it's Dark.
